channel.title: 508 help plz help me!
channel.description: How in the world do you run a 508 server i have a server and they tell me to go to 508....i got a server and client but idk how to run it will you plz tell me!!!!

item.title: 508 help plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @kingtobe kingtobe
item.description:
@kingtobe wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:8, topic:293607”][quote author=raped by who link=topic=388491.msg2904026#msg2904026 date=1249693617]
You have the ‘number 1 game out there’

Yet noone has heard of kingrevolution, and you’re asking how to run a server. which is the absolute EASIEST thing you’ll ever encounter while working with RSPS’s

dont even try to act like you have everything under control, and you’re on top of your game, while you’re asking this stupid of a question
[/quote]

This. How exactly, pray tell me, can you have ‘the number 1 game out there’, when you don’t even know how to successfully turn a server on?

@Topic: Click the thing that says: ‘run’. If you get stuck on that tell us.[/quote]

ok if you want proof heres the toplist site http://www.mmorpgtoplist.com/runescape…

and it’s 317 and i know how to run a server i get a stupid error when i try to run a 508

Read full topic

My reccomendation: Learn something about: Computers, Java, and… honestly… life.

Yet noone has heard of kingrevolution, and you’re asking how to run a server. which is the absolute EASIEST thing you’ll ever encounter while working with RSPS’s

item.title: 508 help plz help me!
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

Let, me take you into the steps.

First.

Download a 508 Source.
Then
A 508 Client, Everything you need is in the download section.

Then when you downloaded them.

It Should Come in a little book.

If you don’t have win.rar downloaded go too Http://www.rarlab.com

Once you done that you should of install it.

This part you need too right click on the source and it should say this “Extract Files”

Do That, Then Click on the folder that has your source .

Click everything in there untill you see a folder called bin.

Then there is run.bat then that should run your server ,

All the steps on top is if u havent already did it yet.

Read full topic
